description: From Middle English hatere, equivalent to hate +‎ -er. Compare Old English hetend, hettend (“enemy”, literally “hater”). Cognate with Dutch hater (“hater”), German Hasser, Hässer (“hater”), Danish hader (“hater”), Swedish hatare (“hater”), Icelandic hatari (“hater”).

entries.meaning: (slang, derogatory) One who expresses unfounded or inappropriate hatred or dislike, particularly if motivated by envy.
